Venipuncture.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the venipuncture site by cleaning it with an antiseptic swab.
Venipuncture.subject: The healthcare provider

Venipuncture.sentence: The healthcare provider selects an appropriate vein for the procedure.
Venipuncture.subject: The healthcare provider

Venipuncture.sentence: The healthcare provider inserts a sterile needle into the selected vein to collect the blood sample.
Venipuncture.subject: The healthcare provider

Venipuncture.sentence: The healthcare provider attaches a collection tube to the needle to capture the blood.
Venipuncture.subject: The healthcare provider

Venipuncture.sentence: The healthcare provider removes the needle and applies pressure to the puncture site with a cotton ball.
Venipuncture.subject: The healthcare provider
